translated: There is no so-called self other than the mind, even though the essence is exhausted.

original: 'di thams cad sems las byung ste nga las byung ba nyid do //
analyzed: 'di thams cad sems las byung ste nga las byung ba nyid do //
translated: All this has arisen from the mind, and it is from me that it has arisen.

original: sa gsum zhes pa ni brtan pa thams cad de /
analyzed: sa gsum zhes pa ni brtan pa thams cad de /
translated: The three worlds are all that is stable,

original: de yang nga las byung ste snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: de yang nga las byung ste snga ma bzhin no //

original: 'di dag ces bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ces bya ba ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'o //

original: nga yis khyab ces pa ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid do //
analyzed: nga yis khyab ces pa ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid do //
translated: I pervade means the nature of the mind.

original: nga las gzhan pa'i 'gro ma mthong //
analyzed: nga las gzhan pa'i 'gro ma mthong //

original: zhes pa ni sems ma yin pa'i rang bzhin med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes pa ni sems ma yin pa'i rang bzhin med pa'o //
translated: This means that there is no nature that is not mind.

original: sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin ni sems yin mod ci'i phyir bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin yin zhe na /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin ni sems yin mod ci'i phyir bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin yin zhe na /

original: gang gi phyir rang bzhin yang dag par rig pa'i sems te /
analyzed: gang gi phyir rang bzhin yang dag par rig pa'i sems te /

original: gnyis kyis stong pa nyid ni sems kyi rang bzhin nyid do //
analyzed: gnyis kyis stong pa nyid ni sems kyi rang bzhin nyid do //

original: sems thams cad ni ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi rjes su song ba'o //
analyzed: sems thams cad ni ye shes nam mkha' dang mnyam pa bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid kyi rjes su song ba'o //

original: gnyis kyis stong pa nyid dag par rig pa ni thun mong yin no //
analyzed: gnyis kyis stong pa nyid dag par rig pa ni thun mong yin no //

original: 'dis ni lhag par mos pa'i rnal 'byor gsungs so //
analyzed: 'dis ni lhag par mos pa'i rnal 'byor gsungs so //

original: de'i phan yon gsungs pa //
analyzed: de'i phan yon gsungs pa //
translated: The benefit of that is taught:

original: de ltar zhes bya ba la @259a * //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba la @259a * //
translated: Thus, etc.

original: sogs pa'o // bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang //
analyzed: sogs pa'o // bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang //

analyzed: zhes pa ni skye ba snga mar bsod nams ma byas pas kyang ngo //

analyzed: 'grub par the tsom med ces pa ni rnal 'byor 'dis bsod nams bsags pas so //

analyzed: za zhes pa ni za bar byed pa na'o //

analyzed: rgyun du zhugs pa ni rnal 'byor 'di nyid kyis ro lhun gyis grub par 'byung ba'o //

original: rgyun du bya ba 'dis ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /
analyzed: rgyun du bya ba 'dis ci bya zhe na gsungs pa /

analyzed: phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi don du zhes bya bar dgongs so //

original: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

analyzed: 'gro ba thams cad ces pa ni sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten no //

analyzed: de dag thams cad gcig tu bsgom par bya ba nyid do //

analyzed: nges par gzung ba gang gi phyir snyam pa la gsungs pa yid kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //

original: yid ni rnam par rtog par byed pa'i shes pa ste /
analyzed: yid ni rnam par rtog par byed pa'i shes pa ste /

original: de nyid kyis brtag par mi bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid kyis brtag par mi bya ste /

original: de nyid kyis ni nges par gzung ngo //
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni nges par gzung ngo //

original: zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: de bas na gsungs pa / chos ni thams cad ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: Therefore it is said:üîΩ‚ÄúAll dharmas are to be known, not imagined.‚Äù

analyzed: chos rnams yongs su shes pa nyid bsgom pa ste rtog pa de ltar ma yin no zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: rtog pa rnams rang bzhin gyis 'khrul pa zhes bya bar dgongs so //

original: de'i tshe yongs su shes pa de ji lta bu snyam pa la gsungs pa /
analyzed: de'i tshe yongs su shes pa de ji lta bu snyam pa la gsungs pa /
translated: At that time, what is that knowledge? It is said:

original: brtag pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
analyzed: brtag pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o /
translated: ‚ÄúExamination, etc.‚Äù

original: sogs pa'i sgras shing dang ri dang rgya mtsho la sogs pa dang srog chags rnams so //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras shing dang ri dang rgya mtsho la sogs pa dang srog chags rnams so //
translated: The word ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes trees, mountains, oceans, etc., and living beings.

original: de dag thams cad mchog gi de kho na nyid du bsgom par bya ba'i /
analyzed: de dag thams cad mchog gi de kho na nyid du bsgom par bya ba'i /
translated: All of them are not to be imagined in the supreme reality,

analyzed: mos pa'i de kho na nyid du sna tshogs par brjod pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i rtog pa ni ma yin no //
translated: but are to be imagined in the reality of imagination as various expressions and various imaginations.

original: yang de'i mchog gi de kho na nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang de'i mchog gi de kho na nyid ji ltar yin zhe na /

original: de bas na gsungs pa /
analyzed: de bas na gsungs pa /
translated: Therefore, it is said:

original: bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: bdag gis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúI‚Äù and so on.

original: bdag ni rang gi sems so //
analyzed: bdag ni rang gi sems so //
translated: ‚ÄúI‚Äù is one‚Äôs own mind.üîΩIts reality is just that, its nature.

original: de'i dngos po ni de nyid de de'i rang bzhin nyid las @259b de skad ces gsungs so //
analyzed: de'i dngos po ni de nyid de de'i rang bzhin nyid las @259b de skad ces gsungs so //
translated: That is said.

original: de rnams gcig ces pa dang / de nyid ces pa snga ma dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de rnams gcig ces pa dang / de nyid ces pa snga ma dang sbyar ro //
translated: Those are one, and that is the same as the previous.

original: gzhan yod min zhes pa ni de kho na nyid gnyis pa med do //
analyzed: gzhan yod min zhes pa ni de kho na nyid gnyis pa med do //

original: gcig pa de yang ji ltar zhe na /
analyzed: gcig pa de yang ji ltar zhe na /

original: gsungs pa / rang rig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gsungs pa / rang rig ces pa la sogs pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSelf-awareness‚Äù and so on.

original: 'o na stong pa nyid ni mchog gi de kho na nyid yin pa /
analyzed: 'o na stong pa nyid ni mchog gi de kho na nyid yin pa /
translated: Now, emptiness is the supreme reality.

original: 'di ltar de ni yang dag pa'i mthar gsungs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar de ni yang dag pa'i mthar gsungs te /
translated: Thus, it is said to be the culmination of reality.

original: yang dag pa ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: yang dag pa ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: Reality is thatness.

original: de rnams kyi mtha' ni gtso bo ste /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtha' ni gtso bo ste /
translated: The culmination of those is the principal.

original: de las gzhan pa'i de kho na nyid kyi don yod pa ma yin pas 'dir rang rig pa la mchog gi de kho na nyid du gsungs pa 'gal lo zhe na /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i de kho na nyid kyi don yod pa ma yin pas 'dir rang rig pa la mchog gi de kho na nyid du gsungs pa 'gal lo zhe na /
translated: Since there is no reality other than that, it is contradictory to say that reflexive awareness is the supreme reality.

original: stong pa nyid ces bya ba cung zad kyang gzhan ma yin no ;
analyzed: stong pa nyid ces bya ba cung zad kyang gzhan ma yin no ;
translated: There is not the slightest difference between what is called ‚Äúemptiness‚Äù and the nature of phenomena.

original: / chos las chos nyid gang tha dad pa'i rang bzhin med de /
analyzed: / chos las chos nyid gang tha dad pa'i rang bzhin med de /
translated: The nature of phenomena is not a different nature from phenomena.

original: 'on kyang de nyid yang dag par rig pa'i chos rnams kyi dngos po'i de kho na nyid gang gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rig pa tsam nyid de /
analyzed: 'on kyang de nyid yang dag par rig pa'i chos rnams kyi dngos po'i de kho na nyid gang gnyis su med pa'i rnam par rig pa tsam nyid de /
translated: However, the reality of phenomena that are correctly cognized is the nondual mere awareness itself.

original: de yang 'dir mchog gi de kho na nyid de //
analyzed: de yang 'dir mchog gi de kho na nyid de //
translated: That is the supreme reality here.

original: de nyid mchog gi de kho na nyid yin pas na rang rig pa nyid mchog gi de kho na nyid du gsungs pa yin pas de bas na ci ste 'gal /
analyzed: de nyid mchog gi de kho na nyid yin pas na rang rig pa nyid mchog gi de kho na nyid du gsungs pa yin pas de bas na ci ste 'gal /
translated: Since that is the supreme reality, it is said that reflexive awareness is the supreme reality. Therefore, how could there be a contradiction?

original: gzhan yang dmigs par bya ba'i de kho na nyid kyi nang nas ni stong pa nyid mchog yin gyi dmigs par byed pa po la sogs pa'i mchog gi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzhan yang dmigs par bya ba'i de kho na nyid kyi nang nas ni stong pa nyid mchog yin gyi dmigs par byed pa po la sogs pa'i mchog gi de kho na nyid ni ma yin no //
translated: Moreover, from among the realities that are objects of observation, emptiness is supreme, but the reality of the supreme object of observation is not.

original: yang rang rig pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid de /
analyzed: yang rang rig pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid de /

original: 'di ltar rang yang dag par rig pa ni dmigs par bya ba'i de kho na nyid rnams kyi mchog stong pa nyid mthong bas rang bzhin yang mthong ba yin pa'i phyir dmigs par byed pa'i rang rig pa nyid mchog gi de kho na nyid yin gyi /

translated: Thus, because self-awareness is the supreme object of observation that is the reality of all objects of observation, it is the supreme reality that is self-awareness, the observer, because it sees the nature of emptiness, the supreme object of observation.

original: stong pa nyid ni ma yin te bems po nyid yin pas so //
analyzed: stong pa nyid ni ma yin te bems po nyid yin pas so //
translated: Emptiness is not the supreme reality because it is inanimate.

original: gang yang gzhan rnams las mchog gi de kho na nyid rnam pa bdun po 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid dang / rgyu'i de kho na nyid dang / las kyi de kho na nyid dang / lam gyi de kho na nyid dang / byed pa po'i de kho na nyid dang /
analyzed: gang yang gzhan rnams las mchog gi de kho na nyid rnam pa bdun po 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid dang / rgyu'i de kho na nyid dang / las kyi de kho na nyid dang / lam gyi de kho na nyid dang / byed pa po'i de kho na nyid dang /
translated: the reality of the cause, the reality of the action, the reality of the path, the reality of the agent,üîΩthe reality of the lord, and the reality of the all-pervading lord.

original: dbang phyug gi de kho na nyid dang / khyab bdag gi de kho na nyid dang ; de rnams ni rang rig pa de nyid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
analyzed: dbang phyug gi de kho na nyid dang / khyab bdag gi de kho na nyid dang ; de rnams ni rang rig pa de nyid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir gsungs pa /
translated: In order to teach that those are just self-awareness, it is said:

original: rang rig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //üîΩdpe med pa shin tu rnam par dag pa rtag tu bde ba'i mtshan nyid ni bde ba chen po ste /
analyzed: rang rig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o // dpe med pa shin tu rnam par dag pa rtag tu bde ba'i mtshan nyid ni bde ba chen po ste /
translated: ‚ÄúSelf-awareness‚Äù and so on.

original: 'bras bu mchog gi de kho na nyid do /
analyzed: 'bras bu mchog gi de kho na nyid do /
translated: The characteristic of the great bliss that is without example, utterly pure, and always blissful is the supreme reality of the result.

original: de'i bshad pa ni bde ba chen po zhes pa yin @260a * //
analyzed: de'i bshad pa ni bde ba chen po zhes pa yin @260a * //
translated: The explanation of that is ‚Äúgreat bliss.‚Äù

original: te ; rang rig pa zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: te ; rang rig pa zhes pa dang sbyar ro //
translated: It is connected with ‚Äúself-awareness.‚Äù

original: rang rig pa de'i dngos po ni de nyid de /
analyzed: rang rig pa de'i dngos po ni de nyid de /
translated: The entity of that self-awareness is just that.

original: de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of ‚Äúits characteristic‚Äù is that.

original: dngos grub ni byang chub ste de ni rang rig pa nyid las byung ngo //
analyzed: dngos grub ni byang chub ste de ni rang rig pa nyid las byung ngo //
translated: Attainment is enlightenment, and that arises from self-awareness itself.

original: de nyid rgyu'i mchog gi de kho na nyid de /
analyzed: de nyid rgyu'i mchog gi de kho na nyid de /
translated: That is the supreme cause reality.

original: dngos grub nyid skyed par byed pa po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dngos grub nyid skyed par byed pa po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the producer of attainment itself.

original: ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nges par gzung ba'o //
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba'i sgras ni nges par gzung ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù is for the purpose of exclusion.

original: rang rig nyid bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: rang rig nyid bsgom pa ste /
translated: It is the meditation on self-awareness itself.

original: de nyid kyis na de lam gyi mchog gi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de nyid kyis na de lam gyi mchog gi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is the supreme path reality.

original: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin las zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i bdag nyid de nyid las kyi mchog gi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: rang rig pa'i rang bzhin las zhes pa ni rang rig pa'i bdag nyid de nyid las kyi mchog gi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: From the nature of self-awareness means from that very nature of self-awareness. The meaning is that it is the supreme action reality.

original: de ji ltar na las yin zhe na /
analyzed: de ji ltar na las yin zhe na /
translated: How is it an action?

original: gnod pa las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: gnod pa las ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is said, ‚Äúfrom harm,‚Äù and so on.

original: de la las ni rnam pa gnyis te ye shes dang rab tu spangs pa'o //
analyzed: de la las ni rnam pa gnyis te ye shes dang rab tu spangs pa'o //
translated: Therein, action is twofold: it is wisdom and complete abandonment.

original: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa zad pa ni spangs pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa zad pa ni spangs pa'o //
translated: The exhaustion of the afflictive obstructions and the obstructions to omniscience is abandonment.

original: ye shes ni chos thams cad rtogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ye shes ni chos thams cad rtogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: Wisdom is the nature of the realization of all phenomena.

original: de las gnod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ni spangs pa mngon sum du gsungs la ye shes ni don gyis so //
analyzed: de las gnod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'dis ni spangs pa mngon sum du gsungs la ye shes ni don gyis so //
translated: The phrase from that, harm and so on refers to the realization of abandonment, while wisdom refers to the realization of the object.

original: gzhung kha cig las ni rtogs pa las zhes 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzhung kha cig las ni rtogs pa las zhes 'byung ste /
translated: In some texts, it says from realization,

analyzed: der ni ye shes dngos grub gsungs la spangs pa ni don gyis so //

analyzed: las skyes zhes pa ni las su 'gyur ba ste rang rig pa'i nyid do //

analyzed: lam las lam gyi byed pa gud na med de lam ni byed pa'o //
translated: The path is not separate from the function of the path; the path is the function.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ni byed pa po ste gang gi phyir sgrib pa de dag 'joms pa dang ye shes byed pa'i phyir ro //

analyzed: de nyid kyis na byed pa po'i de kho na nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu mthar phyin par 'gyur ba ste /

original: de yang rang gi rig pa nyid du gsungs te /
analyzed: de yang rang gi rig pa nyid du gsungs te /
translated: That is also taught to be self-awareness.

original: rang gis sdud cing rang gis byed /
analyzed: rang gis sdud cing rang gis byed /

analyzed: ces pa ni de las ma gtogs pa'i byed pa po med do zhes bya bar dgongs so //

original: ye shes dang spangs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog nyid yin pas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog ste de yang de nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ye shes dang spangs pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi mchog nyid yin pas 'jig rten dbang phyug gi mchog ste de yang de nyid yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Since the one who has become endowed with the perfection of wisdom and abandonment is the supreme of all worlds, he is the supreme lord of the world, and that is also he.üîΩIn order to teach that,

original: rang nyid rgyal po zhes pa gsungs so //
analyzed: rang nyid rgyal po zhes pa gsungs so //
translated: he himself is the king.
